snippet: Marius Vizer accused Thomas Bach of blocking sports federations’ plans for multisport events, interfering in the autonomy of the organizations and excluding leaders from voting on Olympic hosts.
abstract: SportAccord chief Marius Vizer accuses International Olympic Committee president Thomas Bach of blocking his organization's plans for multisport events.
lead_paragraph: Marius Vizer accused Thomas Bach of blocking sports federations’ plans for multisport events, interfering in the autonomy of the organizations and excluding leaders from voting on Olympic hosts.

headline.main: I.O.C. President Criticized by Head of SportAccord
